languages.text: "Ага, больше они не грозятся открыть огонь? Так-то лучше".

traits.locale_text: "Вот теперь, значит, они хотят моей помощи? Как удобно!"

languages.text: "I take it that they are not threatening to fire anymore? That's better."
languages.original_text: "Ага, больше они не грозятся открыть огонь? Так-то лучше".

traits.locale_text: "A-ha, so they are not going to fire anymore? That's better."
"A-ha, so they are not going to fire anymore? That's better."
"A-ha, so they are not threatening to fire anymore? That's better."
"A-ha, so they are not threatening to fire anymore? That's better."
"I take it that they are not threatening to fire anymore? That's better."

languages.text: “也就是说，他们不打算威胁我，也不想朝我开火了？这才对嘛。”
languages.original_text: "I take it that they are not threatening to fire anymore? That's better."

traits.locale_text: “也就是说，他们不打算威胁我，也不想朝我开火了？这才对嘛。”

languages.text: « Alors, ils ne menacent plus de faire feu ? Voilà qui est mieux. »
languages.original_text: "I take it that they are not threatening to fire anymore? That's better."

traits.locale_text: « Alors, ils ne menacent plus de faire feu ? Voilà qui est mieux. »

languages.text: "Sie drohen also nicht mehr damit, das Feuer zu eröffnen? Schon besser."
languages.original_text: "I take it that they are not threatening to fire anymore? That's better."

traits.locale_text: "Sie drohen also nicht mehr damit, das Feuer zu eröffnen? Schon besser."
"Aha, sie drohen also nicht mehr, das Feuer zu eröffnen? Schon besser."

languages.text: «¿Significa eso que ya no amenazan con dispararnos? Menos mal».
languages.original_text: "I take it that they are not threatening to fire anymore? That's better."

traits.locale_text: «¿Significa eso que ya no amenazan con dispararnos? Menos mal».

languages.text: 「ふむ、もう発砲の脅しはないようだな。それはいい」
languages.original_text: "I take it that they are not threatening to fire anymore? That's better."

traits.locale_text: 「ふむ、もう発砲の脅しはないようだな。それはいい」

languages.text: "Ateş açma tehditlerini geri çektiler yani, öyle mi? İyi bari."
languages.original_text: "I take it that they are not threatening to fire anymore? That's better."
